text:
Just now...
I went to the secret base...

To pick out some recommended snacks...
For our snack stash...

...At that moment...
As I looked around...

There were also...
Several new additions...

Haha...
It seems everyone's thinking the same thing.

As time passes...
With more items brought in...
And decorations added...

The secret base...
Becomes even more... like Ho-Ka-Go's colors...

It's enjoyable...
To see that change...

And as...
The secret base becomes a fun place...

The preparations for the live...
Can be carried out even more joyfully...

It makes me happy too...
That everyone's enjoying the preparations.

It's all thanks to...
Producer-sama for providing the space...

If you're willing...
Please feel free to come by and play sometimes...
